Name: VRealistic Fight: Aim For The Chest
About the game: A simple 4 player pvp game with different mechanics: decide whether to shoot to kill or hurt your opponent. It is the year 2140, a world-scale war has started and the enemy union has decided to use reality distortion technology to finish off the allied troops. You are a soldier who has been affected by distortion fields, and it is your goal to escape from a new reality that you do not know. The distortion techniques caused you to see multiple copies of yourself, to the point of not knowing who the real you is.
